scripts.lint:mdui: stylelint --fix --syntax less packages/mdui/src/**/*.less && eslint --fix packages/mdui/src/**/*.ts && prettier --write packages/mdui/src/**/*.ts
scripts.build:mdui: npm run lint:mdui && rimraf packages/mdui/es && tsc -p packages/mdui/src/tsconfig.json && node scripts/mdui/build.js
scripts.build:jq: npm run lint:jq && rimraf packages/jq/es && tsc -p packages/jq/tsconfig.json
scripts.bundle:mdui: npm run build:mdui && rimraf packages/mdui/dist && rollup -c scripts/mdui/rollup.config.js
scripts.bundle:jq: npm run build:jq && rimraf packages/jq/dist && rollup -c scripts/jq/rollup.config.js
scripts.dev:mdui: rimraf packages/mdui/es && tsc -p packages/mdui/src/tsconfig.json && concurrently -k -r "node scripts/mdui/dev.js" "tsc --watch --preserveWatchOutput" "wds --node-resolve --watch --open /docs/"
